Class GuiController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controllers.GuiController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GuiController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
JavaFX controller for the main game screen. Handles keyboard input, HUD, pause/game-over overlays and drawing the board.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init(Main mainApp)
      Called from Main.showGameScene() so this controller can access navigation methods like showMainMenu().

    • setGameMode

      public void setGameMode(GameMode mode)
      Called from GameController so the GUI knows which mode is running. Used when restarting the same mode.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • showRushMilestone

      public void showRushMilestone(String message)
      Shows a milestone notification for Rush 40 mode. Called when the player reaches milestones (10, 20, 30, 40 lines).

    • showRush40Congratulations

      public void showRush40Congratulations()
      Shows a congratulations message when Rush 40 mode is completed.

    • initGameView

      public void initGameView(int[][] boardMatrix, ViewData brick)
      Called by the game logic to set up the initial board and piece view.

    • refreshGameBackground

      public void refreshGameBackground(int[][] board)

      public void setEventListener(InputEventListener eventListener)

      public void bindCombo(javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty comboProperty)

      public void gameOver()

      public void pauseGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

      public void clearProgressText()

    • updateRushProgress

      public void updateRushProgress(int linesCleared, int targetLines)

    • updateSurvivalStatus

      public void updateSurvivalStatus(int shields, int landingsUntilGarbage)

    • updateBestInfo

      public void updateBestInfo(GameMode mode, int finalScore, double rushCompletionSeconds)
      Updates best score and best Rush-40 time for the given mode. Called from GameController when a run ends.

    • refreshBestInfoForMode

      public void refreshBestInfoForMode(GameMode mode)
      Refreshes best info for the given mode without highlighting. Called when a new game starts so the player can see their targets.

    • showFinalResults

      public void showFinalResults(GameMode mode, int finalScore, int totalLinesCleared, int targetLines, double timeSeconds, boolean isWin)
      Shows the final result panel and updates best records.
      Parameters:
      mode - game mode that was played
      finalScore - score at the end of the run
      totalLinesCleared - total lines cleared during the run
      targetLines - Rush-40 target (0 for non-target modes)
      timeSeconds - completion time in seconds (<=0 means "no time")
      isWin - true if the player achieved the mode's win condition
